snippet: A prostate biopsy more than doubles the risk of being hospitalized for infections and other problems within the following month, a new study says.
lead_paragraph: A prostate biopsy more than doubles the risk of being hospitalized for infections and other problems within the following month, a new study says.

headline.main: Screening: Increased Risks After Prostate Biopsy
headline.print_headline: Screening: More Complications After Prostate Biopsy
headline.seo: Prostate Biopsies Increase Risk of Hospitalization, Study Says
